Name: Space Debris
About the game: A Local Co-op Zen Space Rock Demolition game. It began with a dream of two young kids. Demolishing space rocks to collect space dust... ...made so much better together. Now with 14 different ships with unique abilities. Drop in/out Local Multiplayer. Up to 16 Player Couch Co-op. (4 Xinput + 8 Dinput + 4 Keyboard) Playing solo? Add an AI ship to help! Blast rocks. Don't get crushed. A family-made game by a mom and her two kids.
